title: How to clean up audio distortion on VLC Media PLayer?
body: If there is at least about a second that you can identify as just noise (when nobody's speaking), you can try cleaning it up in Audacity (freeware). Select that part, choose Effect->Noise Reduction and click "Get Noise Profile". Now select everything, and invoke Noise Reduction again, that's it. The first time you do that, you give it an idea ...
